quote: Don't blame others as an excuse for your not working hard enough.
Some of us think holding on makes us strong, but sometimes it is letting go.
The biggest room in the world is room for improvement.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
All great achievements require time.
What you seek is seeking you.
A goal is not always meant to be reached, it often serves simply as something to aim at.
So many of our dreams at first seem impossible. Then they seem improbable. And then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
The creative adult is the child who survived.
Spend more time smiling than frowning and more time praising than criticizing.
Ask what makes you come alive and go do it. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
You are confined only by the walls you build yourself.
There are seven days in the week and someday isn't one of them.
The cure to boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity.
I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.
The secret to happiness is freedom. And the secret to freedom is courage.
I've learned that you shouldn't go through life with a catcher's mitt on both hands; you need to be able to throw something back.
Your big opportunity may be right where you are now.
Soon is not as good as now.
Failure is just practice for success.
Art washes away from the soul the dust of every day life.
If you fear failure, you will never go anywhere.
